'''Tale of the Portent''' is a [[Diagram]] obtained from [[Aravinay]] in exchange for one [[Stories of You and the Aranara]]. Once used, it allows the player to [[Forging|forge]] the 4-Star [[catalyst]] [[Fruit of Fulfillment]].
